CreateMember.title: CreateMember
CreateMember.summary: Adds a user to a namespace as a member and grants permissions to the user.

CreateUdfArtifact.title: CreateUdfArtifact
CreateUdfArtifact.summary: Parses all user-defined function (UDF) methods in your JAR or Python file and creates an artifact configuration for a UDF.

DeleteCustomConnector.title: DeleteCustomConnector
DeleteCustomConnector.summary: Deletes a registered custom connector from a workspace.

DeleteDeployment.title: DeleteDeployment
DeleteDeployment.summary: Deletes a deployment based on the deployment ID.

DeleteDeploymentDraft.title: DeleteDeploymentDraft
DeleteDeploymentDraft.summary: Deletes an SQL draft. If the draft is deployed as a deployment and the deployment is published or the deployment status is RUNNING, the deployment for the draft cannot be deleted.

DeleteFolder.title: DeleteFolder
DeleteFolder.summary: Deletes an empty folder. If files or folders exist in a folder, the folder cannot be deleted.

DeleteJob.title: DeleteJob
DeleteJob.summary: Deletes the information about a job that is not in the running state in a deployment.

DeleteMember.title: DeleteMember
DeleteMember.summary: Revokes the permissions from a member.

DeleteUdfArtifact.title: DeleteUdfArtifact
DeleteUdfArtifact.summary: Deletes resources of a user-defined function (UDF) from a namespace. Before you delete the resources of a UDF, you must delete the UDF.

DeleteUdfFunction.title: DeleteUdfFunction
DeleteUdfFunction.summary: Deletes an existing user-defined function (UDF) from a Realtime Compute for Apache Flink workspace.

ExecuteSqlStatement.title: ExecuteSqlStatement
ExecuteSqlStatement.summary: Executes SQL statements to query the metadata. Only DDL and DML statements are supported. DQL statements are not supported.

FlinkApiProxy.title: FlinkApiProxy
FlinkApiProxy.summary: Provides a proxy for Realtime Compute for Apache Flink requests.

GenerateResourcePlanWithFlinkConfAsync.title: GenerateResourcePlanWithFlinkConfAsync
GenerateResourcePlanWithFlinkConfAsync.summary: Submits a ticket that applies for asynchronous generation of the fine-grained resources. This operation returns the ID of the ticket for you to query the asynchronous generation result.

GetAppliedScheduledPlan.title: GetAppliedScheduledPlan
GetAppliedScheduledPlan.summary: Queries the scheduled plan of an application.

GetCatalogs.title: GetCatalogs
GetCatalogs.summary: Obtains details of the specified catalog or all catalogs.

GetDatabases.title: GetDatabases
GetDatabases.summary: Obtains the information about a database in a specified catalog or lists all databases in a specified catalog.

GetDeployDeploymentDraftResult.title: GetDeployDeploymentDraftResult
GetDeployDeploymentDraftResult.summary: Obtains the deployment result based on the ID of the asynchronous ticket.

GetDeployment.title: GetDeployment
GetDeployment.summary: Obtains the details of a deployment.

GetDeploymentDraft.title: GetDeploymentDraft
GetDeploymentDraft.summary: Obtains the details of an SQL draft.

GetDeploymentDraftLock.title: GetDeploymentDraftLock
GetDeploymentDraftLock.summary: Obtains the lock that is used to edit a draft. This can prevent operations performed on the page and API operations from affecting each other.

GetFolder.title: GetFolder
GetFolder.summary: Obtains the details of a folder.

GetGenerateResourcePlanResult.title: GetGenerateResourcePlanResult
GetGenerateResourcePlanResult.summary: Obtains the asynchronous generation result of fine-grained resources based on the ID of the ticket that applies for an asynchronous generation.

GetHotUpdateJobResult.title: GetHotUpdateJobResult
GetHotUpdateJobResult.summary: Obtains the dynamic update result of a deployment when you dynamically update the deployment.

GetJob.title: GetJob
GetJob.summary: Obtains the details of a job.

GetJobDiagnosis.title: GetJobDiagnosis
GetJobDiagnosis.summary: Queries information about abnormal diagnostic items based on the intelligent deployment diagnostics feature.

GetLatestJobStartLog.title: GetLatestJobStartLog
GetLatestJobStartLog.summary: Obtains the latest startup logs of a job.

GetLineageInfo.title: GetLineageInfo
GetLineageInfo.summary: Obtains the lineage information of a deployment.

GetMember.title: GetMember
GetMember.summary: Queries the permissions of a member.

GetSavepoint.title: GetSavepoint
GetSavepoint.summary: Queries details of a savepoint and checkpoint.

GetSessionCluster.title: GetSessionCluster
GetSessionCluster.summary: Queries the information about a session cluster.

GetTables.title: GetTables
GetTables.summary: Obtains the details of a specific table in a database of a specific catalog or the information about all tables in a database.

GetUdfArtifacts.title: GetUdfArtifacts
GetUdfArtifacts.summary: Obtains the details of the JAR or Python file that corresponds to the user-defined function (UDF) that you upload and create.

HotUpdateJob.title: HotUpdateJob
HotUpdateJob.summary: Dynamically updates parameters or resources of a deployment that is running.

ListCustomConnectors.title: ListCustomConnectors
ListCustomConnectors.summary: Obtains a list of existing custom connectors.

ListDeploymentDrafts.title: ListDeploymentDrafts
ListDeploymentDrafts.summary: Queries a list of SQL drafts.

ListDeploymentTargets.title: ListDeploymentTargets
ListDeploymentTargets.summary: Obtains a list of clusters in which deployments can be deployed. The cluster can be a session cluster or a per-job cluster.

ListEngineVersionMetadata.title: ListEngineVersionMetadata
ListEngineVersionMetadata.summary: Obtains a list of engine versions that are supported by Realtime Compute for Apache Flink.

ListJobs.title: ListJobs
ListJobs.summary: Queries the information about all jobs in a deployment.

ListMembers.title: ListMembers
ListMembers.summary: Queries the mappings between the ID and permissions of a member in a specific namespace.

ListSavepoints.title: ListSavepoints
ListSavepoints.summary: Obtains a list of savepoints or checkpoints.

ListScheduledPlan.title: ListScheduledPlan
ListScheduledPlan.summary: Obtains a list of scheduled tuning plans.

ListScheduledPlanExecutedHistory.title: ListScheduledPlanExecutedHistory
ListScheduledPlanExecutedHistory.summary: Queries the execution history of a scheduled plan.

ListSessionClusters.title: ListSessionClusters
ListSessionClusters.summary: Queries a list of session clusters.

RegisterCustomConnector.title: RegisterCustomConnector
RegisterCustomConnector.summary: Registers a custom connector in a namespace. The registered custom connector can be used in SQL statements.

RegisterUdfFunction.title: RegisterUdfFunction
RegisterUdfFunction.summary: Registers specific or all of the user-defined functions (UDFs) that are parsed from the JAR files. The registered functions can be used in SQL statements.

StopApplyScheduledPlan.title: StopApplyScheduledPlan
StopApplyScheduledPlan.summary: Stops the scheduled plan of an application.

UpdateDeploymentTarget.title: UpdateDeploymentTarget
UpdateDeploymentTarget.summary: Updates a cluster on which the deployment is deployed.

UpdateMember.title: UpdateMember
UpdateMember.summary: Updates the permissions of one or more members in a specific namespace.

UpdateUdfArtifact.title: UpdateUdfArtifact
UpdateUdfArtifact.summary: Updates the JAR file of the user-defined function (UDF) that you create.

UpdateVariable.title: UpdateVariable
UpdateVariable.summary: Updates the information about a variable in a namespace.

ValidateSqlStatement.title: ValidateSqlStatement
ValidateSqlStatement.summary: Verifies the code of an SQL deployment.
